column1: obituary of rosemary wells | welcome to leroy p. wooster funeral home & crematory| of rosemary wells. rosemary t. wells
column4: of blackwood passed away peacefully with her family by her side on june 10
column5: 2015. beloved wife of 50 years of richard
column8: donna (michael) yarabinee and kathleen flynn (bert gidaro); loving grandmother of richard
